description.div:
The
Eclipse Persistence Services Project (EclipseLink)
delivers a comprehensive open-source Java persistence solution. EclipseLink delivers a standards based solution with advanced features for enterprise software developers.

section.name: Getting Started
section.description: Select a persistence service and learn more about how to get started developing with EclipseLink.

section.name: Object-Relational Persistence
section.em: EclipseLink JPA enables mapping of Java classes to a relational schema with complete query and transaction processing.

section.name: Object-XML Binding
section.em: EclipseLink MOXy enabled binding an existing or generated Java classes to an XML schema for simple and efficiently integration XML.

section.name: Service Development with Service Data Objects
section.em: EclipseLink SDO enables development DataObject based services.

section.name: Web Service access to relational databases
section.em: EclipseLink DBWS generates Web Services for relational data access.

section.name: Non-Relational Persistence
section.em: EclipseLink EIS enables integration of non-relational systems using JCA resource adapters.
